import { useContext } from 'react'; import NumberFormat from 'react-number-format'; import { ScrapeContext } from './scrapeContext'; const Data = () => { const { scrapes } = useContext(ScrapeContext) return (

Top 100 Profiles sorted by number of Followers

{scrapes.map((scrape,index) => ( ))}
Index InstagramId Name Number of followers Dreister Follower?
{index +1} {scrape.instagramId} {scrape.name} {scrape.isFollowingDreister ? 'YES' : 'NO'}
) } export default Data;
